body.p:
Covington Ky
Dec 31. 1864.
Gov Bramlette
Dear Sir

I was am acting as Commonwealth's Attorney pro tem. at the present Dec. Term of the Kenton Circuit Court, & prosecuted two indictments against Geo. E. Whittaker for selling playing cards without license. He was convicted & fined $5025 in each case

As these ware the first cases of the kind that I have ever known & Mr Whittaker is represented to me to be
a worthy industrious poor, & rather ignorant man, I recommend him as a proper person for Executive Clemency,
We endorse the above & ask that the Governor may remit the fines vs Mr Whittaker

W E Arthur
John F Fisk
J, O'Hara Jr
H Myers.
B W Foley Clk
J S Scott. D. Sheff

Kenton Cir Ct
vs
Geo W Whittaker
$50.25 each
Remitted
10th Jany/65
